website_summaries.verdict: Some users may prefer the smoother application of gel crayons over traditional wax crayons, especially beginners.
pros: Works on a number of surfaces besides paper
Gel crayons require less pressure than wax
cons: Gel crayons can leech dye, causing stains

customer_reviews.title: WARNING*** They are as messy as paint!
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old aboslutely loved these!! I absolutely HATED THEM!! They stain EVERYTHING! The crayons easily break off in chunks and then immediately start to dye whatever they touch. I have bright pink spots all over my wood floors that I cannot get out for the life of me! They have stained a rug, my fireplace, my sofa AND my granite countertops! They easily smear off paper too. My 6 year old colored a picture and climbed onto my bed with it to show me and got dye all over my white comforter. It's all over they're clothes, hands, shoes, etc. They were such a nightmare to clean I finally hid them!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Valantine

customer_reviews.title: Surprised!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful. They glide on the paper so smooth. And i was so shocked that they actually blend well with water added. I knew these were gel crayons, but i didnt know they were water crayons like the TH distress crayons or even gelatos. I am beyond happy with this set. For anyone wondering, they feel like you're drawing with lipstick as another reciew said and act like a water color crayon when water is added and blended out with a brush. Fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: KathrynCastanares

customer_reviews.title: Like coloring with silk
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing. They glide so smoothly across the paper with vivid colors. I love them so much and need them in about 30 more colors. They aren't great for fine detail work, but for wider lines, they're amazing. If you're on the fence, just buy them. I waffled for months about them, and I wish I'd had them long ago.
customer_reviews.author: BrynWTop Contributor: Swimming

customer_reviews.title: WoW, fantastic product, especially for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I will say there are a few colors that appear to be almost identical to another when swatched, and I would highly recommend a swatch sheet as the crayon colors don't always match the color of the crayon case, but the price can't be beat and they work AMAZINGLY well! They are very pigmented, can be used as waterolors, blended very easily (especially with a baby wipe) and the colors are gorgeous! I plan to use these in my Bible Journal and they work just as well as my more expensive ones by Recollections that I purchased at Michaels! For 36 colors, this price can't be beat! The storage case is nice, too!!!
customer_reviews.author: rawbee

customer_reviews.title: I had so much fun creating pictures with my child
customer_reviews.text: These gel crayons are incredibly highly pigmented. The feel is soft and creamy. I had so much fun creating pictures with my child. I wouldn't say these are good for detailed work since the tips are a bit large. I adore the durable case and the color selection. A great buy!!! :)
customer_reviews.author: Minnesota Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Great variety of colors & shades of colors, and the pigment is excellent.
customer_reviews.text: Here is a swatch of all the colors on white notebook paper, I skipped white since the paper is white, the white just doesn’t show on the white paper but is highly pigmented like the others.
customer_reviews.author: Elleigh McDaniel

customer_reviews.title: These Gel Crayons won't break the bank
customer_reviews.text: I got these Gel Crayons by U.S. Art Supply, because an online art course had Gel crayons in the supply list. I have some Gelatos, but wanted a bigger variety like the ones in the class. These are very nice, do a great job, with or without water and the price is great, compared to single purchase Gel crayons, like Marabu. If you are just starting out these are great, I personally think they are as good as the much higher priced "ART" gel crayons. Highly recommend Picture shows one of my ongoing art projects-Rolodex card a day-with backgrounds made with this set of Gel Crayons.
customer_reviews.author: QueenBee

customer_reviews.title: Awesome set!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome set!! Just as advertised: super smooth, super bright, and super washable. You don't have to press so hard to get the color to come out. That's also why they'll get used up much faster than regular crayons but such is life. One complaint I have is that the actual crayon pigment doesn't match the color of the body plastic. So at first glance, this set seems to cover a nice gradation of hues for the same color, but in reality, you don't actually get that nice variation of hues - there a quite a few almost duplicates of colors.
customer_reviews.author: Vudu

customer_reviews.title: Love these!!
customer_reviews.text: Favorite crayons we've used! These are wonderful and are great to color with. They glide so smooth it reminds me of coloring with lipstick but even smoother. They also have twist-able bottoms for when you need more color. The colors that come with the set are perfect! Very vibrant and bold.I find myself coloring with my 6 year old daughter all the time with these. We also use these with water to make beautiful water paint pictures. So fun!
customer_reviews.author: Aimee B.

customer_reviews.title: Have never enjoyed coloring THIS much!
customer_reviews.text: The way these crayons glide is so smoothly is almost therapeutic! Bought for my 4yr old for Christmas and we are already hooked. I have never enjoyed coloring the way I do with these crayons. Never have really enjoyed it that much honestly. Something about the way they glide along the paper makes me feel artistic. I am not. Seriously might have to buy my own set! 👍🏻👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: btruelov

customer_reviews.title: So smooth!
customer_reviews.text: Love these and are great for people with aging hands! These are just perfect for gray scale coloring and using dried up alcohol markers dipped in water smooth the gel crayons out ever so nicely! I have done a few Live videos on Facebook using these because they are wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah L. McDonald

customer_reviews.title: OK for large areas
customer_reviews.text: OK for a large swath of color in areas with good saturation. Nice selection of colors. They do no blend as well as gelatos and I haven't had much success using water with them either. They do lay down color easily and are very creamy. I just wish they blended and thinned much better than they do. I'll keep practicing and trying things with them. Who knows, I might come back and give them a higher rating.
customer_reviews.author: Lin KTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Mixed feelings
customer_reviews.text: Not really suitable for coloring book use IMO, too broad a tip and can't see where you'll be putting color inside about a dime-sized area. Trimming,sharpening would waste WAY too much substance to be suggested. That said, they do lay down a good amount of color very smoothly on paper or similar. Would likely be really good for posterboard-size signs as for a science fair or classroom display. Not suitable for glass or ceramic (even for just a note on a mirror like "pick up milk!" as one is leaving the house.
customer_reviews.author: Zia King

customer_reviews.title: Dont recomend unless it's for a mature drawer.
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought these where great until they starting getting all over my carpet just by dropping them on the floor. They transfer to every surface they are soooo messy! And they break if you have a child who draws on the rough side. I ended up throwing them in the trash bc my poor carpet had colorful spots all over the place
customer_reviews.author: Herrera Family

customer_reviews.title: silky texture crayon
customer_reviews.text: I bought these based on an artist talking about them and decided to give them a try. I have other crayons but the color choices in this set are wonderful, plus it comes in a very nice plastic case that will keep them from being all over the place. they are super smooth and creamy, easy to blend and when they dry they are dry. no feeling of a crayon like others that I have. I have already recommended them to another artist friend of mine.
customer_reviews.author: Marcella Rutledge

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but chunky
customer_reviews.text: We are loving these. They are super smooth and pigmented and there’s lots of beautiful colors to choose from. I gave it four stars just because they are a thicker crayon and so it’s pretty hard to color any picture with great detail carefully with these. They can be a bit clumpy at times as well. But overall they are beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: MamaStorfer

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!
customer_reviews.text: I use these on my abstract acrylic paintings and they are a lot of fun to use. I can experiment and wipe off anything I do not like. They do break if you extend them too long and apply too much pressure. I would love to have a set with more colors.
customer_reviews.author: CANG

customer_reviews.title: ... purchased some scented gel crayons from Pottery Barn and loved them. I was excited to find such a ...
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased some scented gel crayons from Pottery Barn and loved them. I was excited to find such a large set for such an affordable price. These are fun crayons and produce vibrant colors. However I am giving them 2 stars because they stain worse than any other crayon, paint or marker we have. My set "flakes" as they are being used and have stained carpet and even our white kitchen table. Crayola needs to take these over and find a better formula.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product and wonderful pigment
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product and wonderful pigment. I use these for bible journaling as a cheaper alternative to gelatos and am very pleased with the results. They give Awesome watercolor effects, smear nicely, and are great with dry or wet application in blending. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew J. Soto

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun!
customer_reviews.text: These crayons are a ton of fun! The colors come out bright and bold with very little pressure and the set comes with so many more colors than other gel crayons I looked at. The case is great too, other sets I've had did not come with the storage case, this is so much more convenient. Other brands I've tried such as Crayola slick sticks colored even brighter and were more like lipstick than these, but there is actually a lot less mess with these crayons and the colors are still very bold. Stray marks wipe up well enough that I don't worry about the table while my four year old colors with them.
customer_reviews.author: Natams

customer_reviews.title: Great item!
customer_reviews.text: I was really impressed with these gel crayons!! I have never run across these before & had to try them! Smooth coverage for large areas that you want to color & bright colors! Love that they are twistable & larger in diameter than regular crayons! Sharing the info on these in some of the coloring groups I belong to! I love U.S. Art Supply products (this is the 3rd item I've ordered of theirs)!!! Will be getting my grandson a set when he gets a little older & stops putting things in his mouth so much...LOL!!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy French

customer_reviews.title: Love these!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these mostly for using in my art journal and I'm thrilled with them! Super creamy and blendable! I usually use my finger to smudge and blend, or a baby wipe, but a wet paint brush works wonders too and is similar to a watercolor effect. I can't see spending the big bucks on some of the other high-end art crayons when you can get this large set, in a nice storage case, for a fraction of the price. Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Stacia

customer_reviews.title: Smooth, vibrant, FUN pens
customer_reviews.text: Great product and company! The pens are vibrant and ultra smooth when writing/drawing/coloring. I bought for my daughter but I find myself playing with them too! I had an issue with two pens and the company sent me a whole new 24 pack right away. Awesome customer service! We love the pens, and even though 2 had issues in our first pack they all worked in the replacement pack so I would totally buy from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Kellie

customer_reviews.title: These are great!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome crayons. My toddler loves to use these but I’m picky with them! They are great for coloring backgrounds not so much smaller places. They are easy to clean off of items and tiny humans. I will be purchasing more!
customer_reviews.author: Savannah Ledford

customer_reviews.title: Best crayons you will ever buy!
customer_reviews.text: These gel crayons are slick! Super smooth application. They just glide over the paper easier than a marker, leaving behind vivid color without the larger white speckles left by a typical crayon. They will write on skin my toddler proved to me, but it washed off easily. It seemed to come off of her shirt too without any stain wash even, but it was not a light color shirt either. Definitely buying these again. My elementary age kids love them.
customer_reviews.author: glowinggirl

customer_reviews.title: My nephew can't break these or chew on them.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to complete a Christmas gift for my 3-year-old nephew across the country. He's too young to appreciate how awesome they are. My sister says that he has a habit in breaking crayons and trying to put them in his mouth and these don't give him that opportunity. Yay. Also mentioned that they glide smoothly to the paper with barely any effort. The color is also awesome enough that if you color over a line, the line becomes non-existent. She says five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Izzie

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: They are truly like a combination of a gel pen and crayon! They are very soft and gel-like and you can do some wonderful blending with them when you rub the colors together with your finger! The smoothness while you are coloring is very satisfying. The only downside is that they are wide and not pointy so you cannot do small detailed coloring (so for many adult coloring books they wouldn't work), but they are great for large areas!
customer_reviews.author: C. Hall

customer_reviews.title: So creamy, and such a great color selection.
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves these crayons. They are so much easier to use, and so incredibly creamy. This set has a large number of colors to choose from, and my Lilly has made good use of them. She is in the second grade, and is always trying to keep up with grandma. I hope this helps you decide whether to get this set. Thanx, Mindy
customer_reviews.author: Mindy

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Bought two sets for a brown paper bag decorating event. These are super easy to use and like how your twist the bottom to make more crayon appear, like using lipstick. While the crayon spreads on paper easily, it also comes off the crayon/pen and smears easily. So if you have a lots of people/kids using them, if they don't cap them, the box they come in can get pretty messy and the surrounding area, so just be careful with that. These are great if you are coloring on craft paper.
customer_reviews.author: J. Chang

customer_reviews.title: Buttery smooth!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these super smooth crayons! I was actually one of those few who prefer Roseart Crayons over the Crayola ones. But these are even more buttery smooth! My daughter loves them too. The only drawback to these super smooth crayons is that they run out pretty quickly because of the materials they're made of. So just keep that in mind.
customer_reviews.author: Mi

customer_reviews.title: Fun, vibrant, unique
customer_reviews.text: These are so fun and different. If you haven't used these type of crayons before, the texture is somewhat like jelly meets chalk..? Not that they are sticky but kinda see through with substance. My 8 YO doesnt like to color but likes to draw and this gives her a different medium in which to do it. They are a bit wider than the crayon foot print. Great colors vibrant. This set has awesome color selection. And the I felt the price was great.
customer_reviews.author: Indiana

customer_reviews.title: Creamy & Vibrant
customer_reviews.text: Economical price. Cheaper than gelato. Use with good paper, such as primed with gesso, water color paper, & mixed media paper, canvas. Good selection of colors. When putting on paper and using a brush with water the color may have a streak that will not blend. Using a baby wipe does the trick. I bought these to do journaling. I am very pleased with them. Would recommend to add to your color medium collection.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Color pigment is not mixed well, ruined pictures we colored using crayons.
customer_reviews.text: Crayon color pigment is not mixed well, left bright/dark color streaks of the color crayon . I will attach picture to show. Also crayons leave behind flakes of color, be carful where you use these, we put a large drop cloth under our pictures. Ruined the pictures that were being colored. On the flip note they are very smooth and bright. Was super excited to receive but now sad with the outcome.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Rae

customer_reviews.title: Super fun, smooth colors!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! For all you out there that are art lovers, and have always wanted to color with your moms lipstick, this is your fun! Smooth, bright and so amazing for easy blendable excitement! I’m enjoying these and also got the smaller set for my granddaughter to use. Awesome product!
customer_reviews.author: Drummer Girl

customer_reviews.title: My favorite Amazon purchase of the year!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not for everyone, but I felt when I'm using these I'm a child again, I love the texture, how smooth it layers on! A tip: let the first layer of a single color dry for a few minutes and then come ontop with the second layer, that way you aren't pushing the first layer around! Does scatter crumbs of itself on the paper, and can be a bit messy, so for kids I would go with crayola, but these are definitely a alternative for artists!
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: NOT CRAYONS!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are great, very smooth, colorful paint sticks. These are in NO WAY crayons. So that was little disappointing. Therefore, they get used up much faster. These are similar to Pencil Grip Kwikstix Solid Tempera Paint 24ct, Super Quick Drying, 12 Classic, 6 Neon, 6 Metallix Colors (TPG-604), which we already had. Good for coloring small pictures and the case is super convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Ivana

customer_reviews.title: I love these!
customer_reviews.text: The colors are vibrant and there is a nice variety. They color like you would expect a gel crayon to. They can go on in a thick layer, or thinner, just depending on how hard you press. I use the lighter colors to highlight verses in my Bible!
customer_reviews.author: Angie D

customer_reviews.title: These are SO much fun to play with
customer_reviews.text: These are SO much fun to play with. I'm an adult who got these purely for my own joy and they're pretty great. They DO blend easily for a time, then they seem to "set" which I guess is good (eventually I'll want to close my art journal and I don't want pages sticking together).
customer_reviews.author: barrymanglow

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as expected for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Nice set for the price. These are comparable to Faber Castel Gelatos, they create the same, smooth, "lipstick" glide, and can also be used with water and brushes. Just don't expect the same quality as the more expensive, name brand (For example, when diluted they leave streaks.) They are fun to play around with but I will not be using these for any nice projects. If you just want to color and enjoy the creamy texture without wasting your gelatos, these are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn G.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: These crayons are awesome! My child loves them. They are very easy to use. Enough soft, so child doesn’t have to press them hard to draw. Beautiful range of colors, bright and pastels. They are easy to clean even from clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Justyna

customer_reviews.title: Save your money, buy the better set
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy these crappy pens!!!!! The caps come off and don't go back on, fall off and you're left with dried up pens and spending money you shouldn't have. Just splurge and buy a really nice set because these aren't worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Marti

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to use in my art projects, and they work just as well as the more expensive brand. You get tons of colors and shades. I also really like that they blend well together and work perfectly with other mediums as well!
customer_reviews.author: scrappygirl

customer_reviews.title: To transparent on Windows
customer_reviews.text: These do not work well on Windows. Site advertises that it can bees for Windows but the color is too transparent. I was looking for something more opaque which I have found before. Description is misleading. This product does however work well on paper and skin. Do love the variety of color but not going to work for what I need it for
customer_reviews.author: rogue224

customer_reviews.title: Rich colors.
customer_reviews.text: Really beautiful. However, the gel crayons are difficult to use because they are not tapered down so not easy to use in small areas. I'd buy these again if they had the ability to use in smaller areas.
customer_reviews.author: nikki

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to regular crayons or markers for an artsy child!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a Christmas gift for my 8-year-old grandson and my daughter just told me that he LOVES them. I’m so pleased as I wanted to get him some sort of art supply but didn’t want to buy the usual crayons, markers or colored pencils. These seem to have been the perfect alternative!
customer_reviews.author: Former Bookseller

customer_reviews.title: Color Strength and Variety.
customer_reviews.text: I love the super set of gel crayons, that can be used with added water for transparent effects. I also purchased the Sparkle Gel crayons for my great Granddaughter to draw in her Watercolor journal while on vacation. I am very pleased with the strength of pigment and smooth glide of the crayons.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Hutchison

customer_reviews.title: Great price and item
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice colors, well packaged in a nice case. I plan to use these in the craft room. Really happy to have these as opposed to more expensive options, yay!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: So many ways to use these.
customer_reviews.text: You can use them like water colors, blend them with a sponge like inks, or just color. I only wish each one was named or numbered in some way to make it easier to do a swatch sheet and keep up with which one matches which sample.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Gel crayons
customer_reviews.text: I gave 4 stars because i feel like these are very cheaply made compared to other gel crayons I have seen. I purchased for Bible journaling. Definitely does well with bible pages & spreads easily with baby wipe or water.
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: Fun and fast craft sessions.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect addition to My craftroom . Easy to use. Great colors. Handy for kids crafts also. Arrived quickly. Easy art junk journal. Arrived fast. Perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: susan sharpe

customer_reviews.title: Great but messy.
customer_reviews.text: These colors are vibrant! It gets on everything though. Make sure you have a designated area and are ready to clean. When you color with them, it leaves chunks on the paper and it gets everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Kailyn C.

customer_reviews.title: Messy crayons
customer_reviews.text: These are gorgeous but the tip is so thick it’s hard to stay within narrow lines. Therefore, my mermaid book will not look great in the end.
customer_reviews.author: S. Estrada

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful rich color, no pressure needed to draw
customer_reviews.text: A little difficult for a four year old to use unsupervised, as they need to be adjusted as they wear. They inspire creativity as they can be smudge with fingers and even enhanced with water. Remarkable product.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon B. West

customer_reviews.title: My kids love it but it can get messy!
customer_reviews.text: The kids love to use them as they're smooth on paper and the colors are vibrant. They can get very messy as they crumble easily when pressed upon and then stick to clothes, floors and everywhere else. It does wash off easily though.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan C. Mascarenhas

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids
customer_reviews.text: These are decent options to some of the more expensive water soluble crayons. I ended up giving them to a children’s art studio because they didn’t meet my needs and they were thrilled to have them.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen AZ

customer_reviews.title: Repeat customer
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product so much I've ordered it twice! What I love the most is it can write on any color construction paper (yes, the black sheets too). My kids choose to use these over any other medium and what's even better is it travels well. Each crayon twists down, gets capped, then snaps nicely into place in the heavy duty plastic container. I will be ordering this product every year!
customer_reviews.author: CScharlott

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty and vibrant colors. Do smear though.
customer_reviews.text: We do love these crayons because of their satin finish and bold color. My only complaint is that they do smear and transfer color quite a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley P

customer_reviews.title: Super Smooth
customer_reviews.text: These are great for my son who can't hold a crayon with out it breaking and colored pencils aren't that fun for him yet. These glide across the paper and are super vibrant. Coloring has become a fun activity.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for Bible journaling
customer_reviews.text: I used these for the first time for my Bible Journaling and LOVE them. They are easy to use and blend well. I will be purchasing more of these when I use them up!
customer_reviews.author: AA

customer_reviews.title: Great for marking fabric!
customer_reviews.text: These are super nice, great color assortment, the gel lines are perfect for marking fabric, nice dense colors!
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: Soft Crayons, work great!
customer_reviews.text: Our kids love these--oooKay I love to color with these too :-) A little different from traditional crayons. For some reason the kids love to use them and they do a much better job keeping up with them. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Sp007

customer_reviews.title: Messy in the hands of young artists
customer_reviews.text: My almost 5yo managed to get these on everything when coloring... the floor, table, chair, hands, legs, feet.... the crayons crumbled and pieces went all over the place creating tje disaster. I gave some stars because some of the issue may be how my little was using them (pressing hard or twisting too much out perhaps) and they were really easy to clean. Just way too much to clean every time
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice set of creamy, blendable crayons.
customer_reviews.text: Nice variety of colors, just wishing for more of some colors and less of others. Blunt tip takes some time/practice to get used to. Some colors are very creamy and blend like buttah and some will not blend, it's more of a smudge. Overall happy with the product bc I knew what I was getting and it works for me.
customer_reviews.author: S. B.

customer_reviews.title: Crappy on windows, but great on paper.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to draw on windows- horrible on windows. I have no idea how some people got it to look so good. But on paper, colors are very vivid with great coverage, glides on. Since I bought them for windows I was disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. NP

customer_reviews.title: 6 year old art nut approves
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my niece, she said they're the best crayons. Take it from a six year old and get them!
customer_reviews.author: KC Lady

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Marks and writea VERY light, no matter what color you use. Only good on for white board and still marks light.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: I love that they come in a handy pack
customer_reviews.text: I love that they come in a handy pack. No need to put into a crayon or pencil box for school. They are self sharpening. And a cross between crayon and marker.
customer_reviews.author: O.Prosper

customer_reviews.title: Great colors and very easy coloring
customer_reviews.text: Once you use gel crayons, you don’t want to go back to regular crayons! Colors are so vibrant, very easy to apply and my little one loves to color!
customer_reviews.author: Colin and Camden

customer_reviews.title: Smooth and Fun to Use
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly what the other reviewers claim, plus fun to use. Not for precision coloring, but fun for applying swaths of bright color (reminds me of kindergarten and tempera paint.)
customer_reviews.author: knowident

customer_reviews.title: They are to soft and break I’m returning them.
customer_reviews.text: They are way to soft and the tips break so easily. So dissatisfied as I thought they would be great. Returning them please do not waste your hard earned money on this product.
customer_reviews.author: karen hayden

customer_reviews.title: Perfect alternative to Gelatos
customer_reviews.text: Extremely similar to the Faber Castell's gelatos but a lot less expensive. I use it on my mixed media projects. They are so smooth and creamy and fun to use.
customer_reviews.author: mayra lopez

customer_reviews.title: Dont Work
customer_reviews.text: Very hard to color with. The tip is too big. Only good for large areas.
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: Many different ways to use the gel.
customer_reviews.text: Can be use multiples ways. Easy to bland and can be use as watercolors or pastels or like crayons.
customer_reviews.author: esmeralda  miramontes

customer_reviews.title: Unique product
customer_reviews.text: These are different. I like them, but they can be a little awkward to hold. Sometimes they are hard to control. I am still trying to get use to them.
customer_reviews.author: PeanutFL

customer_reviews.title: Go for it!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing. I bought them for my nieces and they absolutely love them. They smell good, are fun to use, are beautiful, and easy to clean. Trust me, go for it. Even as an adult, I love to color with them!
customer_reviews.author: Regina welle

customer_reviews.title: No smear
customer_reviews.text: Great color selection, ease of use for toddler and preschooler, carrying case and less smearing than Crayola brand of gel crayons
customer_reviews.author: PSS

customer_reviews.title: A must try
customer_reviews.text: These gel crayons are a must have for anyone who colors. They go on the page like butter. You can also use your finger or a q-tip to smear it. The only drawback is that they are thick, but that’s where the q-tip comes in handy.
customer_reviews.author: Karen K

customer_reviews.title: Awesomely smooth crayons.
customer_reviews.text: These are great for getting more saturated color. Kind of like a more smoother cray pas in texture, but keeps hands clean and easily extends with a twist. Also comes with a great case for travel.
customer_reviews.author: mamavita

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for myself after granddaughter received them as a gift. They are wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: S. Haas

customer_reviews.title: Works just like distress crayons.
customer_reviews.text: Got 36 beautiful colors, packaging makes easy storage, more bang for your buck.
customer_reviews.author: Cajata

customer_reviews.title: Super silky smooth crayons
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful, silky, smooth crayons. They are big/fat, wouldn't work well for detailed word.
customer_reviews.author: CHoover

customer_reviews.title: GREAT! I would buy it ALL the time
customer_reviews.text: GREAT Crayons! Easy to use VERY fun to use! They last a long time!👍🏻 I would buy it again and again! 👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: DEE

customer_reviews.title: Great color choices.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves gel crayons. They are super smooth. The color choices in this pack are fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: MnW

customer_reviews.title: For kids AND adults
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my kids but I also love coloring with them! They are like butter on paper. You’ll love them and so will your kids
customer_reviews.author: bongypoo

customer_reviews.title: fun to blend
customer_reviews.text: These have been a lot of fun for my son and I to practice blending and are easier to use than oil pastels. They are creamy smooth and enjoyable to put to paper. Detail work is difficult however.
customer_reviews.author: Lorelei Lydeen

customer_reviews.title: Super Smooth, Fun and Blend-able
customer_reviews.text: I have never used gel crayons and bought them initially to do bible journaling. I’m honestly impressed with how smooth they are and how blendable they are. Since they are washable I figured they could be used for some watercoloring too. One of my crayons came damage slightly but it hasn’t effected the use of it yet. I would purchase them again and regularly use these gel crayons over regular crayons any day.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: A Bit Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I have been experimenting with a lot of media in my after school art class, and out of all of them I found these to be overpriced and over packaged for the amount of actual material in the pen. They also crumbled quite easy. I would not purchase them again. Cray Pas and watercolor crayons are a much better media and value.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So amazing!
customer_reviews.text: These are so fun to color with. The saturation and intensity of these crayons is so great. My son chooses these every time over anything else. I.e. markers, regular crayons, colored pencils etc.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel G.

customer_reviews.title: Great colors
customer_reviews.text: Awesome colors... my daughter loves to draw with them...they r so smooth and bright...easy cleanup...would recommend and buy again
customer_reviews.author: D.M Bacchus

customer_reviews.title: Writes like butter
customer_reviews.text: Very smooth and glides very easy! It just smudges very easy, so be careful
customer_reviews.author: Anna Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Best crayons ever
customer_reviews.text: Love love these crayons! We had used them at my daughters preschool group and ordered them right away. So smooth and great quality and packaging. Definitely should buy if you have a little artist.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Serious fun!
customer_reviews.text: I love these crayons. I love them so much I’m buying another set for my stash. As long as you’re not expecting to create a Michelangelo and just have some fun, Then these are for you
customer_reviews.author: Patti

customer_reviews.title: But these!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful price. Using for my art journals. Great colors. Blend easily. But blend them quickly, or the color will set. So much cheaper than the Gellitos
customer_reviews.author: icats61

customer_reviews.title: Rich pigments, glide beautifully. Wonderful art supplies for all ages (3 and up).
customer_reviews.text: Loved these so much we ordered two extra sets for my daughter’s school. These are so satisfying to color with; creamy and they glide beautifully on the paper. Rich pigments. Can’t say enough good things! Also easy cleanup.
customer_reviews.author: NN

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and selection at a very competitive price.
customer_reviews.text: Love the wide color selection. Love the price. Compares favorably with gelatos and distress crayons at a fraction of the cost. Wish I had discovered this product before I had purchased the more expensive ones. I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smoothest crayons ever
customer_reviews.text: Not quite as blendable as I would like but So Smooth. A joy to use.
customer_reviews.author: JolieV

customer_reviews.title: Good color
customer_reviews.text: My kids really like these. Great colors. I save the packing paper from Amazon tape it to the floor and let the kids create. Keeps them busy on an inside day.
customer_reviews.author: Beata

customer_reviews.title: Fun and bold
customer_reviews.text: These are so fun! My kids love them. Note: they are for bigger areas of coloring, not fine details! Love the bold colors!
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia H

customer_reviews.title: Very Soft
customer_reviews.text: These are very soft and smashable! Colors are great and my 2 year old niece loves them, probably should have waited till she was a little older though because she still presses hard.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

product_meta.title: U.S. Art Supply Super Crayons Set of 36 Colors - Smooth Easy Glide Gel Crayons - Bright, Blendable and Washable
feature_bullets: 36 SUPER SMOOTH GEL CRAYONS: A rainbow of 36 eye-catching super bright, super smooth and super washable colors. Super Crayons are easy to use, easy to grip and apply color with a super smooth easy glide across the page. Twist up color delivery

IDEAL for BEGINNERS: Super Crayons are perfect for beginners, as they allow the aspiring young artist to learn the basics of drawing, coloring and blending! Excellent for light, dark or textured surfaces. Use on paper, glass, mirrors, posters, different textures and so much more! Safe for children over 3 years of age

CHILD & ADULT APPROVED: Super Crayons are loved by children, students and adults because of their ease of use, remarkable color blending and exceptional vibrant visual results that can achieved with them. Excellent for coloring books to fine art projects
CONVENIENT STORAGE: Crayons are stored in convenient organizer case with individual spots to hold each crayon, so you can always keep them neatly organized and ready for use

RISK FREE PURCHASE: 100% LIFETIME SATISFACTION GUARANTEE. We're so confident that you'll be delighted with our Super Crayons that if you're not satisfied with them at anytime, we'll provide a full refund
